name: St. Anthony's Dining Room
description: St. Anthony's Dining Room has served San Francisco's Tenderloin neighborhood since 1950, providing free hot meals daily with dignity and respect to all who are hungry, no questions asked.
fullDescription: St. Anthony's Dining Room has served San Francisco's Tenderloin neighborhood since 1950, providing free hot meals daily with dignity and respect to all who are hungry, no questions asked.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free hot meals served daily
- Dine-in or to-go options
- No ID, referral, or questions asked
- Breakfast and lunch available
- Clean, safe, welcoming environment
- Additional social services available on-site
howToGetIt: Simply show up during meal service hours. No paperwork, ID, or appointment needed. All are welcome. Check website for current hours.
address: 150 Golden Gate Avenue, San Francisco, CA 94102
